entry.title: FOG ADVISORY ENDED, Esther
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:07 PM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.3°C

Observed at: Esther 1:00 PM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High zero.
entry.summary: Clearing early this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
